job_description:
Qualification & Skills
2-3 years of Expert in Python, with knowledge of at least one Python web framework (such as Django, etc depending on your technology stack).
Familiarity with some ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries.
Able to integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system.
Solid database skills in a relational database (i.e. PostgresSQL, MySQL, etc.)
Knowledge of how to build and use with RESTful APIs.
Strong knowledge of version control (i.e. git).
Experience deploying Python applications into production.
Amazon Web Services (AWS) infrastructure knowledge is a plus.
Responsibilities
Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code.
Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications.
Designing and creating RESTful APIs for internal and partner consumption.
Implementation of security and data protection.
Working in waterfall and an agile environment with an excellent team of engineers Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Expert in Python, with knowledge of at least one Python web framework (such as Django, etc depending on your technology stack).
Familiarity with some ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries.
Able to integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system.
Solid database skills in a relational database (i.e. PostgresSQL, MySQL, etc.)
Knowledge of how to build and use with RESTful APIs.
Strong knowledge of version control (i.e. git).
Strong knowledge of version control (i.e. git).
Experience deploying Python applications into production.

Google form Link: https://lnkd.in/epVdwiU

The role is positioned in Ahmedabad, IN.
If you think you are a suitable candidate for the role. Connect with us now!

Email: jobs@bombaysoftwares.com | Board no: +91 7575 000 785
